hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin Jabr said:"I heard Anas bin Malik say: 'The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to perform Wudu' with a Makkuk (cup) and Ghusl with five Makkuks (cups)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقَدْرِ الَّذِي يَكْتَفِي بِهِ الرَّجُلُ مِنَ الْمَاءِ لِلْوُضُوءِ
chapter.eng-name: The Amount Of Water Sufficient For A Man's Wudu'
